overview.description: The EcoFlow DELTA 2 is a next-generation portable power station offering 1024 Wh capacity and 1800W output (3400W surge). It represents the perfect balance between power, portability and versatility.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.metaDescription: All answers to your questions about EcoFlow DELTA 2: autonomy, compatibility, warranty...

questions.question: How long can the EcoFlow DELTA 2 power a refrigerator?
questions.answer: With its 1024 Wh capacity, the EcoFlow DELTA 2 can power a standard refrigerator (150W) for approximately 6 to 8 hours continuously.

questions.question: Can you charge the EcoFlow DELTA 2 with solar panels?
questions.answer: Yes, the EcoFlow DELTA 2 is compatible with solar panels up to 500W. It can be fully charged in 3 hours with an optimal solar setup.

questions.question: What is the battery lifespan?
questions.answer: The EcoFlow DELTA 2 uses an LFP (Lithium Iron Phosphate) battery guaranteed for over 3000 charge cycles, approximately 10 years of normal use.

questions.question: Is the EcoFlow DELTA 2 quiet?
questions.answer: Yes, the EcoFlow DELTA 2 is designed for quiet operation. The fan only activates during heavy loads and remains discreet (30 dB).

questions.question: Can the EcoFlow DELTA 2 be used as a UPS?
questions.answer: Yes, thanks to the EPS (Emergency Power Supply) function, the EcoFlow DELTA 2 switches to battery in less than 30ms during an outage, protecting your sensitive devices.
